orgs_to_keep.title: Orgs To Keep
orgs_to_keep.description: Teams belonging to these orgs will be kept

orgs_to_ignore.title: Orgs To Ignore
orgs_to_ignore.description: The teams belonging to these orgs will be ignored.

fail_on_cycles.title: Fail On Cycles
fail_on_cycles.description: If true, the sync will fail if there are cycles in the org chart.

ignore_cycle_teams.title: Ignore Cycle Teams
ignore_cycle_teams.description: As default (false), they are saved with their parent team as root. If true they are ignored.

keep_terminated_employees.title: Keep Terminated Employees
keep_terminated_employees.description: If true, terminated employees will be kept in the org chart under unassigned team.

resolve_locations.title: Resolve Locations
resolve_locations.description: If true, will resolve location information with Faros Geocoding API.

team_id_to_parent_id.title: Team To Parent
team_id_to_parent_id.description: A dictionary with team ids as keys and their parent team ids as values.

team_id_to_name.title: Team Id To Name
team_id_to_name.description: A dictionary with team ids as keys and their names as values.
